title: ICE: debuginfo: Could not find scope info for node NodeExpr(expr(11: false))

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Attempting to compile [`src/test/run-pass/issue-24956.rs`](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/671602c8c9ecc63289289b9059841ddcc498ba09/src/test/run-pass/issue-24956.rs) with `-g` results in:

```
$ RUST_BACKTRACE=1 rustc -g issue-24956.rs
issue-24956.rs:17:9: 17:19 error: internal compiler error: debuginfo: Could not find scope info for node NodeExpr(expr(11: false))
issue-24956.rs:17         STATIC_FOO => 3,
                          ^~~~~~~~~~
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box<Any>', ../src/libsyntax/diagnostic.rs:176
stack backtrace:
```
